summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of a JAX‑to‑TensorFlow conversion layer, checking correctness of transformed functions, gradients, JIT compilation, custom differentiation rules, data types, and platform interoperability.
business_intent: Ensure that developers can reliably convert JAX models to TensorFlow with accurate gradients and performance characteristics, supporting advanced features such as custom VJP/JVP, pytrees, and mixed‑precision, thereby reducing integration risk and accelerating deployment pipelines.
